name: spastic
content:
offensive old-fashioned a word, which was used by doctors in the past but which is now extremely offensive, used to describe a person who has cerebral palsy (= a condition of the body that makes it difficult to control the muscles), or to describe things related to or typical of the condition
offensive old-fashioned a word for a person who has cerebral palsy (= a condition of the body that makes it difficult to control the muscles), which was used by doctors in the past but is now extremely offensive
offensive informal an extremely offensive word for a stupid clumsy person
